name: BetaDemo: Project Metroidvania
description:
This is my current Project: A Sci-Fi Metroidvania.

It is still in the beginning of the production. So you can see here what I build in so far and below  what will come. above you can play the Beta/Demo in the Browser and below you can download it.

Please tell which Controller don't work, so I can improve all the time.

Tutorial:
  • Move ->
    • Keyboard: ArrowKeys/WASD 
    • Gamepad: Dpad/LeftStick 
  • Jump -> 
    • Keyboard: Space
    • Gamepad: Button South: X/A/B 
  • Attack -> 
    • Keyboard: V
    • Gamepad: Button West:  Square/X/Y  Button East: Circle/B/A
  • Crouch/Sneak -> 
    • Keyboard: Shift
    • Gamepad: R3
  • Go off platform ->
    • Keyboard: DownKey
    • Gamepad: DpadDown/LeftStickDown
  • Pause -> 
    • Keyboard: Escape
    • Gamepad: Start

Will come soon:

  1. UI improvement with changeable Control Input.
  2. Bigger Maps with Subscenes.

Will always be important to improve:

  • Movement 
  • Melee
I would love to hear Feedback.
